Docs.param: The number of leaves to use.
The minimal number of documents allowed in a leaf of the tree, out of the subsampled data.

A delegate to set more settings. The settings here will override the ones provided in the direct signature, if both are present and have different values. The columns names, however need to be provided directly, not through the .
